game.name: Shoot Your Nightmare Halloween Special
game.description:
Halloween is celebrated in different countries like Portugal, Italy, Mexico, and Ireland with a full of excitement and thrill. But what you can do if you get a chance to celebrate it in a unique style? Yes this nightmare can kill you so be careful when you enter this fun challenge. You have to face multiple enemies when you enter the challenge. Are you ready to challenge Slenderman, Slendrin and zombies of all sizes? Join Shoot Your Nightmare Halloween Special and be prepared to spot all thirteen candy bowls hidden in different locations!

You can also spot the green jelly blooming around. Your objective in this brand new action game is to find all 13 candy bowls that are hidden at different locations. Try to be very quick and do not hesitate in applying all your weapons and enjoying this awesome HTML5 shooting game! There are 4 different weapons with lots of ammo combined with easy controls, colorful graphics and seamless gameplay. This Halloween special is more of a shooter, not a scary type.

Keep your eyes on the screen to watch out for those slimy ghosts in this horror game! When your eyes are open, you find in an area filled with darkness and you as a player have to explore this darkness to reach to the most wanted candy bowls to wake up. Hey! You are suddenly trapped within your nightmares. Use your fighting abilities to shoot all of your nightmares using your handgun! Good luck to complete this 3D horror first-person shooter game and have fun without download!
